short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocks AI detection and plagiarism checkers on the Chegg Expert Dashboard.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is for experts to submit their answer seamlessly without any issues on Chegg platform.

HOW TO USE:
1. Try to submit answer normally.
2. If AI/Plagiarism Error comes, Click on the extension
3. Green Screen Will Open 
4. Refresh the page and submit answer again.

NOTE: Uninstall/Remove old version and delete the files if any.
